'''Alpha v1.0.17_02''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on August 20, 2010 to attempt to fix a bug. This version is present in the [[launcher]].

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Oak Fence (EW) JE1.png|32px]] [[Fence]]'''
* Now can be crafted with 6 sticks.<ref>[https://i.gyazo.com/1d53c3865541ed5d783677a9e910f039.png v1.0.17_01 screenshot] {{archived link|https://web.archive.org/web/20210908031144/https://i.gyazo.com/1d53c3865541ed5d783677a9e910f039.png}}</ref>
{{Crafting table
|A2=Stick
|A3=Stick
|B2=Stick
|B3=Stick
|C2=Stick
|C3=Stick
|Output=Oak Fence
}}

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Milk Bucket JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Milk]]'''
* Milk can no longer be stacked; it previously stacked up to 64.
** It is possible that this change occurred in [[Java Edition Alpha v1.0.17|Alpha 1.0.17]] or [[Java Edition Alpha v1.0.17_01|Alpha 1.0.17_01]], but these versions cannot be checked as they are currently lost.

== Fixes ==
* A failed attempt to fix a duplication exploit.</onlyinclude>
